title: Kirchhoff loop - two batteries and two resistors

content.question: The circuit shown in the figure contains two resistors and two identical batteries, with resistances and <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>emf</mi></math> values as indicated. What is the current in the circuit?

choices.label: <math alttext="one half times open parenthesis, uppercase script E over R, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>Ɛ</mi><mi>R</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="two thirds times open parenthesis, uppercase script E over R, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>Ɛ</mi><mi>R</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="four thirds times open parenthesis, uppercase script E over R, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>Ɛ</mi><mi>R</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="five halves times open parenthesis, uppercase script E over R, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>Ɛ</mi><mi>R</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="four thirds times open parenthesis, uppercase script E over R, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi>Ɛ</mi><mi>R</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
